
{{Client function}}
This function is used to get the development mode of the client. For more information see [[/setDevelopmentMode.md|setDevelopmentMode]]

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool getDevelopmentMode ()
</syntaxhighlight>

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the development mode is on, ''false'' if off.

==Requirements==
{{Requirements|n/a|1.1.1-9.03355|}}
